entry.tran: (在英国，根据法律凡车龄3年以上的车辆必须进行的)年检，旧车性能检测
entry.def: In Britain, an MOT is a test which, by law, must be made each year on all road vehicles that are more than 3 years old, in order to check that they are safe to drive.

example.ex: My car is due for its MOT in two days' time.
example.tran: 我的车再有两天就该年检了。
